about_the_game:
Come in! Nightclub with neon Rhythm Story sign. Music and fun give way to screams. The corpse of the girl was found in the toilet. Panic. The detective is ready. What evidence is there? What's the motive? An atmospheric rhythm adventure with a deep storyline

Mei and Rei have been best friends since childhood, but lately, Rei has begun to go somewhere every evening and come back in the morning. She used to have problems with the law, but May hoped that was in the past. We started going to the Rhythm Story nightclub and everything was fine ...

The demo will include a prologue with 5 rhythm games with no time limit. You can learn the plot of the plot and play various rhythm games during the event, where you will need to feel the rhythm and press the keys in time.

This project is a cross between Rhythm Doctor and Night in the Woods in a narrative manner. You have to not only solve the case, but also protect the criminal.

short_description: Rhythm Story is inspired by the masterpieces of Sally Face and Friday Night Funkin '. This is an easy-to-play detective rhythm game in which all the characters are girls. And you have to solve the murder of one of them. Or to protect the criminal.
supported_languages: English, Russian, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Japanese
